title: Gistana (WebGIS Destana)
description: Gistana (WebGIS Destana) is a WebGIS that presents evacuation routes and gathering points in several villages in the Bulawa district, Bone Bolango Regency, Gorontalo, Indonesia.

title: Kabupaten Gorontalo GIS
description: Kabupaten Gorontalo GIS (KabGGIS) is a WebGIS that provides geospatial information on agricultural areas in Gorontalo Regency, Gorontalo, Indonesia.

title: Anonymsg
description: An anonymous messaging platform for you to share your opinions freely without fear of other people's judgment

title: Ingridentify
description: Ingridentify is an app that uses AI and computer vision to recognize fruits and vegetables, addressing meal planning, unhealthy eating habits, and food waste.

title: StoryTelling
description: This is a simple project to show user story from Dicoding Story API. This application was created as a submission to the Belajar Pengembangan Aplikasi Android Intermediate course in Dicoding.

title: JSON Modelizer
description: A lightweight and intuitive Object-Relational Mapping (ORM) package designed to work with JSON files as a data storage solution.

title: Sea Cinema
description: Seacinema is a functioning movie booking website that allows users to book tickets for movies, view movie details, and view their booking history.

title: KSL Website
description: The official website of the Kelompok Studi Linux Universitas Negeri Gorontalo, which is used for new member registration.

title: Any Apis
description: Contains any rest apis that I need, and maybe you need too.

title: KanvasGL
description: A Javascript library to do Computer Graphics on the HTML5 Canvas element.
